h1.style: text-align: center; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-image: initial; background-position: 0px 0px; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; border: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; font-size: 34px; line-height: 60px; text-transform: capitalize; font-family: AmericanGotURW-Bol; font-weight: 600;

span.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

p.style: text-align: center; background: 0px 0px rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; color: rgb(50, 61, 73); font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 26px;

div.p: Please fill out the form below in order to submit an item for valuation.
